tourBios.intlVics: (6) 2003 Platinum Classic [SAf]. 2006 Telkim PGA Pro-Am [SAf]. 2008 BMG Classic [SAf]. 2009 Nashua Golf Challenge [SAf]. 2011 KCM Zambia Open [SAf].2012: ISPS Handa Match Play Championship [SAf].
tourBios.carHigh: 2013: Returned to PGA TOUR Canada for the first time since 2004, making four cuts in five starts, including a T8 at the Dakota Dunes Open and three other top-25 finishes. 2012: Won the Handa Match Play Championship over fellow PGA TOUR Canada player Jaco Ahlers. 2011: Won the KCM Zambia Open ina playoff over Jean Hugo. 2009: Won the Nashua Golf Challenge by two strokes over Tyrone van Aswegen. 2008: Prevailed by one stroke to win the BMG Classic. 2007: Played in The Open Championship (missed cut). 2006: Won the Telkom PGA Pro-Am. 2005: Played in The Open Championship (missed cut). 2003: Won the Platinum Classic with a 17-under 199 over Ashley Roestoff. Was involved in a six-man playoff at the European Tour's Dunhill Championship, eventually finishing T2. 2002: Finished 9th at the European Tour's Bell South African Open. 2001: Fired a course-record 11-under 61 at the Grant Forest Products/NRCS Classic. 2000: Shot third-round 61 to tie a South African Tour record at the Stenham Swazi Open where he finished T2.
tourBios.personal: Born in Durban, South Africa, and began playing golf at age 7...Has nine career holes-in-one...Enjoys fishing and listening to the Eagles.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Canada was T8th in 2013 at the Dakota Dunes Open presented by SASKTEL.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 88th in Career Money Leaders on the PGA TOUR Canada.
